content: lay the yarn in a loop as if making a knot enter the hook into the loop catch the working thread with the hook and pull through the loop now you have the first stitch in the ring continue in the same way when the 1st row is finished you can pull at the end of the thread and the ring will close if working in rounds join the row then chain one loop is on the hook catch the working thread with the hook and pull through the loop on hook page 8 of 13 © 2008 by www unikatissima com square n fair - margarethe used stitches single_crochet one loop is on the hook insert hook into the stitch of previous row catch the working thread with the hook and pull through the stitch you have now two loops on the hook catch the working thread again and pull through both loops half treble yarn over the working thread then insert hook into the stitch of previous row catch the working thread with the hook and pull through the stitch you have now three loops on the hook catch the working thread again and pull through all three loops at once page 9 of 13 © 2008 by www unikatissima com square n fair - margarethe used stitches treble yarn over the working thread then insert hook into the stitch of previous row catch the working thread with the hook and pull through the stitch you have now three loops on the hook catch the working thread again and pull through the first two loops you have two loops on the hook catch the working thread again and pull through both loops slip_stitch this stitch is used to join the row as well as to walk the length of one side of the triangular half square insert hook into the stitch of previous row catch the working thread with the hook and pull through the stitch and the loop on hook page 10 of 13 © 2008 by www unikatissima com square n fair - margarethe used stitches treble_crochet yarn over twice the working thread then insert hook into the stitch of previous row catch the working thread with the hook and pull through the stitch you now have four loops on the hook catch the working thread again and pull through the first two loops you have three loops on the hook catch the working thread again and pull through the first two loops you have two loops on the hook catch the working thread again and pull through both loops page 11 of 13 © 2008 by www unikatissima com square n fair -
